Posts.Content: Jul 27, 2015 01:33AM Ferrety-Woozle wrote: Thank you all for your replies. I did meet with my surgeon again and I asked him point blank if he thought it was cancer. He avoided looking me in the eyes and said that we would deal with that once he was able to "get that thing out of there". He's now talking about removing random lymph nodes as well. I'll know more about surgery date later today. Thank you all for your support. It is greatly appreciated.
Posts.Title: Surgeons need better poker faces... Ferrety-Woozle Tomboy
